forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 3C. SSW winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 38F. SSW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
